problem.markdown:
Please look through the following questions about pull request reviews.
>>Can you review a pull request that someone else is reviewing?<<
(x) Yes ( ) No
[explanation] Providing your expert knowledge is always useful, even if someone else also is. Two heads are better than one! [explanation]
>>Can you review PRs from 2U?<<
(x) Yes ( ) No
[explanation] Here's another case where your expert knowledge is welcome. You shouldn't feel obligated to review 2U PRs, but if something piques your interest you should feel free to do so. [explanation]
>>Can you drop in and review something your weren't tagged on?<<
(x) Yes ( ) No
[explanation] Again... your expert knowledge is needed! And again, you shouldn't feel obligated to review additional PRs but if you're interested in one, jump on in. [explanation]
>>Should you review PRs for repos you aren't a Core Contributor for?<<
(x) Yes ( ) No
[explanation] Reviewing PRs and making contributions to repos you're not a Core Contributor for is a great way to become a Core Contributor on those repos in the future! [explanation]
problem.p: Please look through the following questions about pull request reviews.
problem.label: Can you review a pull request that someone else is reviewing?

div.p: Providing your expert knowledge is always useful, even if someone else also is. Two heads are better than one!

problem.label: Can you review PRs from 2U?

div.p: Here's another case where your expert knowledge is welcome. You shouldn't feel obligated to review 2U PRs, but if something piques your interest you should feel free to do so.

problem.label: Can you drop in and review something your weren't tagged on?

div.p: Again... your expert knowledge is needed! And again, you shouldn't feel obligated to review additional PRs but if you're interested in one, jump on in.

problem.label: Should you review PRs for repos you aren't a Core Contributor for?

div.p: Reviewing PRs and making contributions to repos you're not a Core Contributor for is a great way to become a Core Contributor on those repos in the future!
